# Interface IntentPropsNodeInterface

Interface for Intent Node creation properties.

interface IntentPropsNodeInterface {  
executionConfig?: [IntentNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface](./graph_nodes_builtin_node_execution_config.IntentNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface);  
id: string;  
intentMatcher: [IntentMatcher](/classes/primitives_intent_intent_matcher.IntentMatcher);  
}
